text: waqalati l-yahudu yadu l-lahi maghlulatun ghullat aydihim waluʿinu bima qalu bal yadahu mabsutatani yunfiqu kayfa yashau walayazidanna kathiran min'hum ma unzila ilayka min rabbika tugh'yanan wakuf'ran wa-alqayna baynahumu l-ʿadawata wal-baghdaa ila yawmi l-qiyamati kullama awqadu naran lil'harbi atfa-aha l-lahu wayasʿawna fi l-ardi fasadan wal-lahu la yuhibbu l-muf'sidina
